text: 4.12: 1 Ko 16.11; Ta 2.7; 2.15; 1 Pi 5.3Mbe ndu garim, ndu maneŋ guman kamara ki. Mbe khuen ndu ndɨkndɨgɨ thari, ndu guma khɨn ma. Fhuvara. Ndu tɨvir vhuuiŋra muuŋrim, mba Fhe Bakɨme zɨn panan ruagi gumgi gu mbigi ndun tɨvi ganɨv, nta zɨn ŋgɨri. Ndu nzuai buni, ndu tɨvir vhuuiŋra mbui buni suaŋv, ruru vhuuŋra muuŋv, guigira wo ndavar harigi ntɨɨri nɨɨŋri, guigira Zisas khothɨgɨp, Fhe Bakɨme vuzvugi tɨvir mbe khɨvɨv, mbe suaŋri.
